name: Lannie Schafroth
text:
They let my order sit while drivers left with other orders. Now been 90 minutes. They say they will make it again so it's fresh. We'll see...
Update: it was very fresh and tasty. If it hadn't taken 90 minutes they would get 5 stars for the taste.

name: David NIELSEN
text: Solid pizza, toppings kinda fell off but I still ate it all.

name: Hugo Swanepoel
text: So this place looks a little dodgy pulling up but its great. The staff are all friendly and food is really good, i always get a pizza and wings so if you don’t know what you want definitely do that combo! They’re surprisingly busy so definitely order ahead. Not a sit down available here

name: Tamela K
text: Where is the bottom of our pepperoni pizza? The other pizza is half pepperoni and half pepperoni and onion. They just threw some onions on top and they caramelized and shrunk into strings. These were even the redo's that they made us, …More

name: Nick Vivone
text: Pizza and pasta was delicious. Thanks for a great dinner!

name: John Todsen
text: My son came in with a free personal pizza coupon and he redeemed it. He picked it up and within three steps, dropped it. They replaced it with no questions asked and were amazingly nice about it. Thank you so much.

name: J N
text: Unfortunately there is a lack of fast food in the extreme west Ankeny/ Polk city area. I do frequent this location and it is a negative experience over 50% of the time. Ask for extra sauce and you get even less sauce. Thin crust pizzas are …More

name: Lisa Pickering
text: Why is it every time we try to order from this place it becomes such a hassle! They hardly get the order correct . When asking them to tell a price or special it's to much to do . I dont think they understand what they are doing at all! Plus they never answer the phones so you can not hear them with it ringing.

name: The Icegeneral
text:
Extremely long wait only to have part of the order "forgotten" and then another long wait. Everything was stone cold by the time we were able to even start eating and even then everything was lustre.
Will Not be going here again.

name: Katie Murphy
text: We order from here A LOT, more than most people should probably. Always great service and delicious pizza!! Fans for life.

name: Leslie Stern
text: My son likes to order from this Pizza Hut about two times per week.  He always order the Italian sausage hand tossed pizza and bread sticks, sometimes garlic knots.  Every time we order, our order is correct, the employees are friendly (we usually get carry out) and the food is consistently PERFECT!  Keep up the great work!

name: Lynn Douglas
text: My husband and I tried out this location for the first time tonight. When my husband came back to the car with our pizza, the first thing he said was that we are never going to eat food from there again. The service was slow and unfriendly. …More

name: Sunshine Collins
text:
My order was quickly processed, correct,  hot,  and tasty. The staff was nice and professional.  The store was clean and tidy. Pleasantly surprised.
Ordered 4 pizzas, carry out

name: Chris Schmidt
text: I generally love Pizza Hut, but this one is incredibly inconsistent and stingy. Food regularly over or undercooked. Always something wrong.

name: Joshua Jones
text: I thought I'd go for the salad bar. This is not a dine in Hut. No salad bar. No dine in. Nice guy though.

name: Chance Denney
text: I’ve always ordered carry out here and I’ve always gotten great customer service. The food is always pretty good too. Good choice for those wanting pizza.

name: Crystal Brugman
text: Kids had reading log certificates for personal pans. They were out of personal pans so they made they a medium. That was the best part of the experience. Pizza I ordered was burnt. Like they should have never served it. But when I mentioned …More

name: Alex Drzycimski
text: Can they get some shades on the windows for the employees in there? The sun is pouring in and it was about 90 degrees in there. Combine it with working next to giant ovens and those are some unsafe and unsanitary working conditions. Dominos …More

name: Kate Wernimont
text: The only way to order a pizza here is for carryout. They forgot to deliver a pop and when I called the store, they said they would have it out in about 15 minutes. It took almost two hours for the pop to be delivered. We were only about …More

name: Amanda Elsberry
text: First off, Pizza is always hot and delicious. Second, it’s always been on time and polite drivers. Third, tonight we ordered and they gave us a free pizza with the one we ordered due to being 5 min late. We were so appreciative of the hospitality.

name: Addison Glommen
text:
Delicious pizza, wings, and more! They even have fries and ketchup.
Good at cleanliness, speedy, accurate orders, and always pleasant friendly people with smiles who are willing to help with any problem. Excellent and competitive pricing too. The best cheese pizza

name: Nathan Vu
text: Ordered pizza online came 10 minutes late(no big deal) we open the box and the pizza is burnt. I Called they said they would send me a new pizza it has been 1.5 hours and we still have no pizza.....

name: Marissa Holloway
text: One of the best places in Ankeny to order from. If they’ve made mistakes in the past, they have hired the right people to correct it. Haven’t been disappointed 10/10 times in the last 6 months. Have had carry-out AND delivery. Super nice staff and drivers.

name: Jennafer Perry-Thoren
text: The food is good but the customer service is atrocious! First they answer the phone "Hello?" No statement of which business. The young gentleman then proceeds to assume, "Yeah, you called for delivery right?" We hadn't even stated whether …More

name: Shelby
text:
Order:
Large supreme pizza: burnt.
Large pepperoni thin crust pizza: extremely dry,  overcooked, sauce nonexistent. …More

name: Darrian Drumheller
text: Ordered pizza at 8:30pm said it would be delivered in 30-45min at 9:30pm I called the store and they said the driver left at 9:26pm I waited till 10:15pm driver never showed so I called the store the employee said the driver was broken down …More

name: eric mansmith
text: Good deal on on line orders

name: Jennifer Fern McDaniel
text: Over half hour late (after baked, waiting on driver, confirmed by phone). Came cold and soggy [ordered Thin and Crispy] with dehydrated vegetables from attempt to keep warm? No detectable cheese..  INEDIBLE even after attempting to reheat …More

name: Mia Battani
text: I have only had a problem with this location regarding the delivery time/food quality once. Every other time I have ordered from the Ankeny Pizza Hut, the service has been acceptable at the least and the food has been great. I will continue …More

name: Boris Dragojevic
text: Called to place an order... Got hung up on... Called back and put directly on hold.... What a joke.

name: Bretton Finch
text: Staff is sometimes a little iffy and I've had them get my order wrong a few times (though to be fair they've quickly replace the order without any issue). Delivery times have always been solid and the food always ends up tasting good. While not perfect, I never hesitate to order from here.

name: Nathan Rowedder
text: Showed up when pizzas should have been ready, then waited nearly an hour as they remade one pizza and then put the rest of my order in the oven.  Staff gave us some free sodas and a $10 off coupon on next order that I'm probably not going to use...ever.

name: Shelly Ouverson
text: Delivery order consistently missing items. If i wanted to go pick up missing items, i would have ordered carryout. Felicia is rude and condescending. Too bad, my family really likes their pizza.

name: Dice Clay
text:
1-8-19
....Zero stars.... …More

name: Charity Wenham
text: They don't even deserve this. We ordered at 6:31 pm and almost 3 hours later we still have no pizza. We called and they said it was on its way 40 minutes ago... if you never get your delivery it's not free. You get nothing!

name: Karly Hagen
text: This place is so bad it's almost funny. The first time we ordered, it took right around two hours for it to be delivered. They had estimated 30 minutes. The next time, we ordered a carry out taco pizza. What we received was a taco pizza …More

name: Zenith Janoy
text: I order from this restaurant a few times a month for delivery, usually I receive Excellent pizza cooked all the way and sometimes we get wings with our order, and the only complaint I've had until this recent experience was that the wings …More

name: John -Der Geist- Zensen
text: I ha no real problems with the service, everything was made on time, but the portioning sizes seemed... minuscule in terms of what they should have been: I love stuffed crust, so I figured „ what the heck, I'll spring for it, “ shelled out …More

name: Maggie Hopkins
text: If I could give this a half a star I would. Worst customer Service and instead of giving me my money back they keep just giving me store credit. So making me come back and it seems like the managers switch every month. I am a Culinary …More

name: Dill Bolich
text: Well being a previous employee of Pizza Hut I usually do carry out because the way the run there delivery makes it notorious for getting no so fresh food. Well being that my fiance is working and has our only vehicle I decided to get …More

name: Kelsey Williams
text: I would give this place zero stars if I could. I always say I’m going to give them another chance and I regret it every time. The pizza looks like it was just thrown together and the delivery expected time is never accurate. It takes at …More

name: Jared Peterson
text: Pizza Hut must have changed their dough.  Was fantastic!  We also tried some of the new crust options and got a pretzel one, garlic, and the pizza hut.  All were good and pretzel on was a hit.

name: Tamela K
text: This place cannot get an order right to save their lives. I think I have FINALLY learned my lesson to NEVER go back. Today I ordered 2 pizzas. One medium, thin crust, pepperoni. Look at the pics I posted. Where is the bottom of the pizza? I …More

name: James Richards
text: After the phone rang Forever I finally got what is apparently a call center she couldn't find the town that our Pizza Hut is located in because I didn't have the exact street address she told me it would take 15 minutes for pickup once I …More

name: Scott Johnson
text: Got the worst pizza I have ever had on 2/1/14 from here. Filled out an online complaint about the quality and customer service wrote me back the same day and apologized for the poor quality, offering me three free pizza coupons that would …More

name: Trae Blessing
text: Pizza is always late. Always underwhelmed by the food quality as well. You can only hope it will be good so many times before you just stop being a customer.

name: Ben Blazin
text: THIS PIZZA HUT SEVERELY LACKS CONSISTENCY AND  CUSTOMER SERVICE. ORDERED FOOD ONLY A FEW TIMES BECAUSE THEY SUCK! I HIGHLY RECOMEND ROSATIS PIZZA. MAYBE A MILE NORTH OF PIZZA HUT OFF ANKENY BLVD. I PROMISE YOU WON'T BE LET DOWN!

name: Edited Visions
text: We love the pizza but service can take FOREVER. We have moved on to better pastures.

name: Andrew Morales
text: Was in Ankeny with my wife who on business. Order from here and they were very friendly. More than willing to deliver to the hotel we were staying at. Knowing that we were at a hotel they provided us with everything we needed for our meal inculing plates and cups for our two liter.

name: Jonah Thompson
text: Best pizza gig in Skankeny, the cutest managers and drivers.

name: Rick Ramer Jr
text: Not happy at all. we get there then they have no records of the order because there system went down.then get the pizza home and there was parts of the pizza was hot then there was parts that was cold.

name: Marc Mullin
text: They always forget your toppings for the beef taco, and I tell them to go back and get them. Then they still forget your stuff, they forgot to bring in the first place... So I decided to go to the store to get my money back and they have to …More

name: Ronda Stapleton
text: We order from this location as it's the only one in town. They get the order wrong 90% of the time. They have given me out dated soda on multiple occasions (more than 3). The timing of the orders is usually good, however. …More

name: Dyonne H
text: I wish I could give these guys no stars. We've ordered from them 3x now, trying to give them the benefit of the doubt, but every time we are waiting a minimum of 2 hours for our food. We are currently going on 3 hours. I will never give them another chance again.

name: Jamie Steeples
text: Usually 45 minutes to an hour late, pizza arrives rubbery & cold, order is delivered missing items, & you do not get your money back in whole so you end up paying for their inadequacies.  What great service.

name: Sherri Meza
text: Terrible experience with this pizza hut. FIRST: I received a pizza from them a few weeks ago that was delivered with no sauce, it was just cheese on top of the pizza crust and chicken. They also didn't put the crust seasoning I requested on …More

name: Chris Oltmanns
text: Believe the ratings. Thought I would give them a try. Did not deliver pizza. Tried calling them back several times and they hung up! They will go out of business soon. Never again!

name: Coup Pons
text: This particular location is ridiculous. Called to order for delivery and the girl asked me if 80 mins until delivery was acceptable. Are you kidding me? I have ordered from here before and they are usually late on delivery anyway, but I …More

name: Christa Myers
text: Customer service is terrible. I hate having to talk to the call center as they can't take my personal pan certificates. And the local Ankeny store won't answer phone calls. It is extremely frustrating!!

name: Ken Danzie
text: Pizza was extra burnt amazing wish I could post a picture this is ridiculous.

name: Inthavong Lovanh
text: I am not satisfied at all. Ordered pizza, wings, breadsticks and I had to wait 2  hrs for delivery, the food had gotten cold. 40 mins late from the time of delivery and also I had to warm up all of my food! So mad and disappointed.

name: Luong-Ho Ela
text: This place only offer carry out or delivery and you hqve to order online, you can't not stay for food

name: Michele Randolph
text: Always friendly staff

name: Danyelle Cole
text: This pizza hut has turned around brand new management pizza are awesome ready when I get there and always hot!!! Love it

name: Josh Knox
text: Never had any problems always fast and delicious

name: Angela Feller
text: Came half an hour before they said they would be here...food was fresh hot and taste was really good...best breadsticks I have ever had!!! Thank you!

name: Alex Denney
text: Terrible customer service. Just made excuses as to why the pizza was 2.5 hours late, never once said sorry. Then when the pizza did show up it was wrong and not what we had ordered.I would never recommend the ankeny, iowa pizza hut to anyone

name: Hans Buldhaupt
text: I should have looked for the rating before ordering I would have now exactly what to expect food was over 40 minutes late talked to the driver the driver says call into the office to get things settled then I call into the store and they …More

name: Kory H
text: Always good pizza

name: Douglas Keady
text: Ordered online for my wife tonight and they forgot to make half the order, so she had to wait an extra 15 minutes. Charged full price, wings came out with little to no sauce on them. Garbage service.

name: Ryan Zylstra
text: Ordered online at 730pm on a sunday, didnt arrive until 910pm, delivery driver didnt even have a pen, everything was cold, and we were also short breadsticks. Called the store they offered to remake and redeliver and theyd have it out in 45 minutes. No thanks, I have lost my confidence in pizza hut. Papa johns from now on.

name: Mariah Richter
text: our pizza took longer than we expected. it showed with it looking dry and had been sitting for awhile. it was also the wrong pizza and we never got our wings.

name: Andrew Peterson
text: I recently got a pizza from this location. As I was waiting, I couldn't help but watch the young man in the back text on his phone and wipe his nose without washing before touching the dough. Not impressed and not going back.

name: Cassie Aldrich
text: Pizza and local staff are good, but I HATE the fact that when I call to order I get a stupid call center and not the actual business.

name: Austin Hillebo
text: Terrible customer service. Phone service was awful

name: Sean Trusty
text: Never got my pizza I was 4 miles waited 1.5 hours to tell me we can't deliver to you

name: Kevin Johnson
text: worst pizza hut ever, crust is constantly undercooked and they run out of crust and/or toppings much too often for a chain pizza place

name: Breanne Aschoff
text: Literally never on time.

name: Easton Hope
text: Pizza Hut more like Eastern Hutt

name: Jason Clark
text: We have had issues last 2 times

name: Mohammad Asif

text:
I couldn't get ground moose on my pizza and frag is bad at rainbow 6 so I'm not happy with my current service Ahchuwa

text: Rarely gets an order right, no consistency, not customer friendly service.

text: NEVER AGAIN WILL I WAIT 3 HOURS FOR MY FOOD

text: Pizza was kinda doughy. Bearded dude at the register didn't look very presentable.

name: Indi Curiel
text: Never have traditional bone-in wings. Worst experience ever.

name: James Hauswirth
text: Worst pizza experience I've ever had. I am currently waiting on an order I made 2 hours ago. This is the third time in a row this has happened. Terrible.

name: alex hand
text: Couldn't delivery pizza further than 2.5 miles when I'm 3 miles away

name: Mary Diersen
text: Restaurant is just carry out and delivery AND it's the only Pizza Hut in Ankeny so we couldn't take the family out for a sit down dinner.  By the same token - no buffet...

name: dave nesbit
text: Terrible sums it up! This place is the worst and I would not eat here again!

name: Steve H
text: Too many things wrong to take the time to write....all boils down to one thing, get trained mature people to work here

name: Baleigh Lofland
text: WORST service of any pizza place around! Customer service reps are absolutely terrible and rude
